item.title: Pothole, 31st January
item.description:
Thus is further along than the large pothole as you come into Tudor Way. Its is a deep but thin hole, running left to right.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tudor Way, Poverest, Greater London

item.title: Bollard hit, 31st January
item.description:
It’s uprooted pavement and it’s a hazard. Please fix
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No 28 garden, 31st January
item.description:
The tree was scheduled for pruning in 2025 by Camden council as we have been repeatedly told for the several years that we have been flagging the issue. however it is now Jan 26 and nothing has been done. The tree is now far taller than the height of the houses and far higher than the distance to the houses. Roots are starting to lift floors in the adjacent properties and causing damage
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gondar Gardens, West Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 household black bins overflowing and on public pavement, 31st January
item.description:
I keep putting these bins inside the property of the HMO and the residents keep putting them on the street. They are then used for all passers by and chip shop packaging. They overspill and are unsightly and restrict a public pathway. No recycling ever.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pellerin Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole that is dangerous to drive over but impossible to avoid, 31st January
item.description:
This pothole has been there for several months and is getting wider and deeper. It is only a matter of time until someone damages a wheel in it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tudor Way, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing bins, 31st January
item.description:
Last weekend you had to clear this area. The landlord send someone to clear the front garden but they put everything in the bins. Which left them full and now they are overflowing with passers-by dumping in them. The bins need to be in the front garden.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clapton Passage, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of flowing water, 31st January
item.description:
There is a large amount of flowing water on the road, coming down from Leesons Hill and going over the traffic lights. Im unsure as to the cause but it's likely to be a burst water main or blocked drain.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Leesons Hill, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned bikes next to Euston Sq entrance, 31st January
item.description:
These abandoned bikes are right next to the Euston Square entrance, behind the utility boxes on Gower St. Purple and white DAWES, black GIANT, and a random wheel. Please remove.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Euston Road, Fitzrovia, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge amount of graffiti on wall at Burchell Road, 31st January
item.description:
Please remove all of this. It will take a couple of coats of pain to cover it up properly. How has it been allowed to build up like this?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Burchell Road, Peckham, Greater London

item.title: Broken paving trip hazard, 31st January
item.description:
A paving stone is broken and causing a trip hazard. Please fix this.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Highbridge Wharf, Greenwich

item.title: Sign facing away from road, 31st January
item.description:
This sign has (yet again) been turned away from the direction of traffic. Drivers cannot see the sign telling them a parallel crossing is approaching. Collisions have happened. This has happened before, so fixing the sign tighter might help prevent it.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Southgate Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light works intermittently and is off frequently every night, 31st January
item.description:
